scope_of_work.problem: It is the manufacturers recommendation that the East Powerhouse ACB's are maintained as they are 5 years old
scope_of_work.scope:
Attend CBRE office for induction and sign relevant paperwork
All switching to be completed by CBRE
Handover ACB to contractor to carry out maintenace as follows
Air Circuit Breakers
- Full 20 Point mechanical service.
- All Coils / Accessories functionality and impedance checked – where possible.
- Moving / Arcing contacts cleaned / inspected. Contact wear and arcing contact gaps measured
and recorded.
- Protection Release injected at multiple thresholds. All trip times verified against manufacturer’s
tripping curves.
- 30 Mechanical service operations carried out.
- Fixed Portion cleaned and subject to 10 Point inspection.
- Mechanical interlock visually inspected for set up and functionality.
- ACB low Ohm continuity (10A) and insulation resistance (500v) tested.
- Successful re-instatement.
Restore ACB to normal service
Sign off relevant paperwork
scope_of_work.justification: It is the manufacturers recommendation that the East Powerhouse ACB's are maintained as they are 5 years old. Maintenance can reduce the risk of failure of parts resulting in possible outage on the UPS system which will in turn affect the IT load
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Maintenance can reduce the risk of failure of parts resulting in possible outage on the UPS system which will in turn affect the IT load

scope_of_work.problem:
The Shunt Pump on Boiler 1 has failed.
The pump that has failed is now obsolete so a replacement pump will require installing and due to this pipework will also require modifying to suit new pump.
scope_of_work.scope:
• LOTO the pump
• Isolate the water valves either side of the pump
• Drain the section of pipework
• Remove the failed pump
• Modify the pipework and flanges to accommodate the new pump
• Install the new pump
• Open all valves and check for leaks
• Re-establish the power supplies
• Check the new pump operation
scope_of_work.justification: Without the shunt pump being replaced, this stops the operation of Boiler 1 and limits the resilience and also the output required to heat the building.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Without the shunt pump being replaced, this stops the operation of Boiler 1 and limits the resilience and also the output required to heat the building.

scope_of_work.problem: Water ingress internal to the DC during periods of heavy rainfall.
scope_of_work.scope:
Maintenance team to attend site and carry out the following works:
Supply of working at heights trained operatives.
Supply of SSSTS trained Roofing Supervisor
Supply of Drainage Team.
- Operatives to access roof.
- Operatives to access internal inspection hatches.
- Operatives to use specialist drainage CCTV camera equipment to survey all RWP's
- Operatives to supply all info to office to compile a full report.
All works to take place Within normal working hours.
All job-related waste to be removed from the site.
Full RAMS to be provided before works commence.
Post works report supplied on completion of works.
scope_of_work.justification: To confirm E Bldg Roof Drainage System integrity.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Increased risk of further rainwater ingress to the DC.

scope_of_work.notes:
1. Does not include any client contingency

4. This is for the lighting to be installed in front of the Totem Signage at the Front of the location only
5. The detailed scope will give guidance to the works that will be undertaken as part of this LSQ
scope_of_work.problem: Kyndryl Totem Signage to the front of the location at Warwick has been altered to allow for Kyndryl branding and no longer has lighting to enable a visual of the sign during the evening/night hours
scope_of_work.scope:
Electrical Works

Supply and install 1No- 30Watt high performance LED Projector light c/w antiglare hood onto a newly formed concrete base to light up the front of the existing Entrance Totem
sign. The flexible cable will be installed from the light fitting contained within a 20mm PVC Kopex into the existing cable ducting that is connected into the Adjacent Inspection Pit.
Isolate and disconnect the existing manufactured Totem sign LED Driver supply cable within the inspection pit and make safe the cabling within the IP Rated adaptable box – Hand the LED Driver back to CBRE FM Ltd
Final connections of the new LED Projector light flexible cable into the IP Rated
Adaptable Box. Carry out Electrical Testing to current BS7671: Amendment 2 - 2022

Civils Works

Erect low level barriers, CAT Scan / survey the area of works and mark out any findings from the CAT Scan / trench locations
Hand dig through soft dig approx 2mtr x 0.2mtr x 0,45mtr to create trench to expose existing
ducting.
Hand dig through soft dig approx 2mtr x 0.2mtr x 0,45mtr to create trench to install new cabling and ducting.
Back fill both trenches with 50mm sand,
Back fill both trenches with 200mm salvaged spoil and lay warning tape, complete back fill of trenches with 200mm of salvaged spoil.
Hand dig through soft dig to create area 0.3mtr x 0.3mtr x 0.2mtr to allow for the installation of a concrete pad.
Create shuttering to allow for shaping of the concrete pad. Mix & pour concrete to create new pad. Deconstruct shuttering. Secure / fix 30Watt high performance LED Projector light onto Concrete pad. Back fill trenches with 50mm top soil and grass seed. Dispose excess spoil and leave site clean and tidy
scope_of_work.justification: If this works is not complete then the external totem signage to the front of the Warwick location will not have any lighting to illuminate during darker hours
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: As per Justification - No lighting to front entrance totem signage

project_name: UPM-E Bldg Compound Gate Remedials May 22

scope_of_work.problem: E Bldg Compound Gate requires a full overhaul and update/replacement of all safety features.
scope_of_work.scope:
Following engineers recent survey of existing sliding gate as per
Ack 2189590;
Safety upgrade includes fitting new safety controller with new A-Frame
brackets and rubber safety edges to prevent drawing in and crushing
risk.
New motor/gear box needed with pinion.
Upgrade very old control board to new version and reconfigure set up
to suit.
Install new traffic lights which include special compatible board and
power supply.
A complete replacement of sliding gate rollers and set up.
scope_of_work.justification: E Bldg Compound Gate operation has become intermittent and will often not open or close. Additionally, the specialist survey has identified faulty safety features that require urgent remedial action.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Continued intermittent operation and risk of injury or property damage.

scope_of_work.problem: Cooling Tower 3A single fan, has fan propeller blades sheared off it's rear fan propeller. Resulting in the Fan not being operational.
scope_of_work.scope: Specialist Contractor to strip down and remove single fan section, Shaft, 2 x propeller sets, bearings and pulleys and then replace with all new parts. Once installed the fan will undertake testing to prove it operates correctly.
scope_of_work.justification: If the Fan is not replaced with new the Cooling Tower cannot be operated, in which could then lead to an impact for the resilience on site for the cooling and equipment within the site.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: If the Fan is not replaced with new the Cooling Tower cannot be operated, in which could then lead to an impact for the resilience on site for the cooling and equipment within the site.
